basic_info.description: ðŸ‘‹ I'm Joaquin FarfÃ¡n. A Film enthusiast and web designer :) Currently, I'm working with Front-End frameworks such as React.js and AngularJS. My journey into Web Development began with my own attempts in the E-commerce world, leading me to dive fulltime into UX design and Front-End Development.

projects.title: E-commerce website
projects.description: Online book store with user profile, integrated payment system, and backend for managing shipments and returns. As a co-founder of the company, I had to do everything from shipping and accounting to being responsible for web design, SEO, and commercial strategies. It's not the best website I've seen, but it's a start.

projects.title: App Prototype
projects.description: One of my first UX design case studies and protoyping. I had some expreience Wireframing before taking the Google UX design certificate but I realized didn't understand accessibility nor keeping the user center in every stage of the design process.

projects.title: Personal Website
projects.description: One of my first freelance web design projects. I had to develop wireframes and prototypes for the site and, after client approval, develop the code in HTML5, CSS, and JavaScript. Later, I decided to adapt the code to deploy it as a React.js app instead of HTML. I learned a lot from this project.
